name: Class RecordedClassLoader
codes:
public final class RecordedClassLoader
extends RecordedObject

methods.description:
Returns the class of the class loader.
 
 If the bootstrap class loader is represented as null in the Java
 Virtual Machine (JVM), then null is also the return value of this
 method.

Returns the name of the class loader (for example, "boot", "platform", and
 "app").

Returns a unique ID for the class loader.
 
 The ID might not be the same between Java Virtual Machine (JVM) instances.
